subject: Chemistry
question_text: In the sulphur estimation, 0.20 g of a pure organic compound gave 0.40 g of barium sulphate. The percentage of sulphur in the compound is ______ . (Molar mass : in ) 2025 (29 Jan Shift 2) JEE Main 2025 January JEE Main Previous Year Paper MathonGo ⩾ √ h π × 1 2 m H 2 SO 4 KIO 3 5I − + IO − 3 + 6H + →3I 2 + 3H 2 O KIO 3 H 2 SO 4 I 2 KIO 3 Molecular weight 5 C ) →C ) + XkJmol −1 ) + O 2 ( g) →CO 2 ( g) + YkJmol −1 +O 2 ( g) →CO 2 ( g) + ZkJmol −1 ×10 −1 % O = 16, S = 32, Ba = 137 gmol −1
